statusType.description: LU defined and sentences ready for annotation
statusType.name: New

statusType.description: LU defined in frame, but sentences not yet extracted from corpus
statusType.name: Created

statusType.description: LexUnit was created during FrameNet I and has some annotation
statusType.name: FN1_Sent

statusType.description: LU was defined in frame during FrameNet I, but contains no sentences
statusType.name: FN1_NoSent

statusType.description: LexUnit's SubCorpora have been defined but not yet created
statusType.name: SC_Defined

statusType.description: Not available for annotation due to problems with definition of frame or frame elements
statusType.name: Problem

statusType.description: Regular annotation completed during FrameNet II
statusType.name: Finished_Initial

statusType.description: Annotation and final checking completed during FrameNet II
statusType.name: Finished_Checked

statusType.description: LexUnit has been annotated only for X-Gov labels
statusType.name: Finished_X-Gov

statusType.description: Not enough examples to annotate completely
statusType.name: Insufficient_Attestations

statusType.description: LU created only for software testing
statusType.name: Test

statusType.description: Subcorporation rules have been defined, but not run
statusType.name: Rules_Defined

statusType.description: This LU is left unannotated because it is so similar to others in this frame
statusType.name: BTDT

statusType.description: An LU whose status was Needs_SCs has had more
statusType.name: Add_Annotation

statusType.description: LexUnit needs more sentences in new SCs
statusType.name: Needs_SCs

statusType.description: ProcessRules has run on the LU and some FEs have been pre-marked on the basis of the rules
statusType.name: Pre-Marked
